title: AbstentionRecord
description: Schema for a single abstention event record in the MathLedger RFL system

abstention_type.description: Canonical abstention type from the taxonomy. Core types: abstain_timeout (time limit exceeded), abstain_budget (resource exhausted), abstain_crash (unexpected crash), abstain_invalid (invalid input/state), abstain_oracle_unavailable (oracle unavailable). Lean-specific: abstain_lean_timeout, abstain_lean_error.

failure_state.description: Optional FailureState value from failure_classifier module

method.description: Verification method string that triggered abstention (e.g., 'lean-disabled', 'lean-timeout', 'truth-table-error')

context.description: Additional context dictionary with arbitrary key-value pairs

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the abstention event (e.g., '2025-01-15T10:30:00Z')

examples.details: Lean fallback disabled for hermetic run
